Miscellaneous Highlights: The Angels tied it in the eighth with a successful squeeze play but grounded into a double play with the go-ahead run at third.
Eric Wagaman hit into a double play with first and second and nobody out in the 10th.
The Angels hit into three critical double plays late in the game, including the 10th inning.
